text: Greg Taylor is a Democratic member of the Indiana Senate. He has represented the 33rd District since 2008. Taylor is treasurer of the Indiana Black Legislative Caucus. ==External links== *State Senator Greg Taylor official Indiana State Legislature site * Category:Indiana state senators Category:Living people Category:Indiana Democrats Category:Indiana lawyers Category:African-American state legislators in Indiana Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Greg Taylor (politician)
